text:
@realDonaldTrump Mr President, as you know, this statement is not true. You voted with a mail in ballot in the recent primary. You are working to deny the elderly, disabled and disadvantage the right to vote. In this time of a novel COVID-19 it is mean to bully the most  vulnerable.  

Shame!
